post.summary: Create new navigation property to calls for communications

patch.summary: Update the navigation property calls in communications

post.summary: Create new navigation property to operations for communications

patch.summary: Update the navigation property operations in communications

post.summary: Create new navigation property to participants for communications

patch.summary: Update the navigation property participants in communications

post.summary: Create new navigation property to onlineMeetings for communications

patch.summary: Update the navigation property onlineMeetings in communications

callbackUri.description: The callback URL on which callbacks will be delivered. Must be https.

callRoutes.description: The routing information on how the call was retargeted. Read-only.

targets.description: The targets of the call. Required information for creating peer to peer call.

requestedModalities.description: The list of requested modalities. Possible values are: unknown, audio, video, videoBasedScreenSharing, data.

callChainId.description: A unique identifier for all the participant calls in a conference or a unique identifier for two participant calls in a P2P call.  This needs to be copied over from Microsoft.Graph.Call.CallChainId.

recordingLocation.description: The location where the recording is located.

recordingAccessToken.description: The access token required to retrieve the recording.

replacesCallId.description: Optional. The call which the target identity is currently a part of. This call will be dropped once the participant is added.

clientContext.description: Unique Client Context string. Max limit is 256 chars.

isMuted.description: true if the participant is muted (client or server muted).

isInLobby.description: true if the participant is in lobby.

callChainId.description: A unique identifier for all  the participant calls in a conference or a unique identifier for two participant calls in P2P call. This needs to be copied over from Microsoft.Graph.Call.CallChainId.

participantId.description: A unique identifier for a specific participant in a conference. The CVI partner needs to copy over Call.MyParticipantId to this property.

mediaLegId.description: A unique identifier for a specific media leg of a participant in a conference.  One participant can have multiple media leg identifiers if retargeting happens. CVI partner assigns this value.

deviceName.description: The user media agent name, such as Cisco SX80.

deviceDescription.description: Any additional description, such as VTC Bldg 30/21.

cloudServiceName.description: The Azure deployed cloud service name, such as contoso.cloudapp.net.

cloudServiceInstanceName.description: The Azure deployed cloud service instance name, such as FrontEnd_IN_3.

cloudServiceDeploymentId.description: A unique deployment identifier assigned by Azure.

cloudServiceDeploymentEnvironment.description: A geo-region where the service is deployed, such as ProdNoam.

mediaQualityList.description: The list of media qualities in a media session (call), such as audio quality, video quality, and/or screen sharing quality.

creationDateTime.description: The meeting creation time in UTC. Read-only.

startDateTime.description: The meeting start time in UTC.

endDateTime.description: The meeting end time in UTC.

joinWebUrl.description: The join URL of the online meeting. Read-only.

subject.description: The subject of the online meeting.

region.description: The home region of the participant. This can be a country, a continent, or a larger geographic region. This does not change based on the participant's current physical location. Read-only.

countryCode.description: The ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code of the participant's best estimated physical location at the start of the call. Read-only.

threadId.description: The unique identifier for a thread in Microsoft Teams.

messageId.description: The unique identifier of a message in a Microsoft Teams channel.

replyChainMessageId.description: The ID of the reply message.

sequenceId.description: An incremental identifier used for ordering DTMF events.

sourceParticipantId.description: The ID of the participant that triggered the incoming call. Read-only.

observedParticipantId.description: The ID of the participant that is under observation. Read-only.

serverMuted.description: If the media is muted by the server.

channelIndex.description: The channel index of media. Indexing begins with 1.  If a media session contains 3 video modalities, channel indexes will be 1, 2, and 3.

mediaDuration.description: The total modality duration. If the media enabled and disabled multiple times, MediaDuration will the summation of all of the durations.

networkLinkSpeedInBytes.description: The network link speed in bytes

localIPAddress.description: the local IP address for the media session.

remoteIPAddress.description: The remote IP address for the media session.

inboundPackets.description: The total number of the inbound packets.

outboundPackets.description: The total number of the outbound packets.

averageInboundPacketLossRateInPercentage.description: The average inbound stream packet loss rate in percentage (0-100). For example, 0.01 means 0.01%.

averageOutboundPacketLossRateInPercentag.description: The average outbound stream packet loss rate in percentage (0-100). For example, 0.01 means 0.01%.

maximumInboundPacketLossRateInPercentage.description: The maximum inbound stream packet loss rate in percentage (0-100). For example, 0.01 means 0.01%.

maximumOutboundPacketLossRateInPercentag.description: The maximum outbound stream packet loss rate in percentage (0-100). For example, 0.01 means 0.01%.

averageInboundRoundTripDelay.description: The average inbound stream network round trip delay.

averageOutboundRoundTripDelay.description: The average outbound stream network round trip delay.

maximumInboundRoundTripDelay.description: The maximum inbound stream network round trip delay.

maximumOutboundRoundTripDelay.description: The maximum outbound stream network round trip delay.

averageInboundJitter.description: The average inbound stream network jitter.

averageOutboundJitter.description: The average outbound stream network jitter.

maximumInboundJitter.description: The maximum inbound stream network jitter.

maximumOutboundJitter.description: The maximum outbound stream network jitter.

tollNumber.description: The toll number that connects to the Audio Conference Provider.

tollFreeNumber.description: The toll-free number that connects to the Audio Conference Provider.

dialinUrl.description: A URL to the externally-accessible web page that contains dial-in information.

displayName.description: The identity's display name. Note that this may not always be available or up to date. For example, if a user changes their display name, the API may show the new value in a future response, but the items associated with the user won't show up as having changed when using delta.

upn.description: User principal name of the participant.

innererror.description: The structure of this object is service-specific

top.name: $top
top.description: Show only the first n items
